text: @charliekirk11 I tweeted that the second news broke about the Coronavirus! The Chinese are playing with Trump like the Japanese did at Peace talks, while planning an attack on Americans at Pearl Harbor, the entire time! I bet all those chicken's will test positive for the Coronavirus!
